THE BOYZ

Introduction

Lee Ju-Yeon is a South Korean singer under ONE HUNDRED. He was discovered by a casting director while watching a concert with his family and ultimately became a trainee. He made his official debut on December 6, 2017, as the main dancer, vocalist, and visual of the eleven-member boy group The Boyz.
